Boots.description:
+25 Magic Resist

UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed
UNIQUE Passive - Tenacity: Reduces the duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, polymorphs, and immobilizes by 20%.
Boots.name: Mercury's Treads
Boots.plaintext: Increases Movement Speed and reduces duration of disabling effects
Boots.sanitizedDescription: +25 Magic Resist UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed UNIQUE Passive - Tenacity: Reduces the duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, polymorphs, and immobilizes by 20%.

+30 Armor

UNIQUE Passive: Blocks 10% of the damage from basic attacks.
UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed
Boots.name: Ninja Tabi
Boots.plaintext: Enhances Movement Speed and reduces incoming basic attack damage
Boots.sanitizedDescription: +30 Armor UNIQUE Passive: Blocks 10% of the damage from basic attacks. UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed

Boots.description:
+30% Attack Speed

UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed
Boots.name: Berserker's Greaves
Boots.plaintext: Enhances Movement Speed and Attack Speed
Boots.sanitizedDescription: +30% Attack Speed UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed

Elixirs.description:
Level 9 required to purchase.

Click to Consume: Grants +300 Health, 25% Tenacity, increased champion size, and Path of Iron for 3 minutes.

Path of Iron: Moving leaves a path behind that boosts allied champion's Movement Speed by 15%.

(Only one Elixir effect may be active at a time.)
Elixirs.name: Elixir of Iron
Elixirs.plaintext: Temporarily increases defenses. Leaves a trail for allies to follow.
Elixirs.sanitizedDescription: Level 9 required to purchase. Click to Consume: Grants +300 Health, 25% Tenacity, increased champion size, and Path of Iron for 3 minutes. Path of Iron: Moving leaves a path behind that boosts allied champion's Movement Speed by 15%. (Only one Elixir effect may be active at a time.)

Endgame Items.description:
+300 Health
+55 Attack Damage
+20% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion Cleaves them, reducing their Armor by 5% for 6 seconds (stacks up to 6 times, up to 30%).
UNIQUE Passive - Rage: Dealing physical damage grants 20 movement speed for 2 seconds. Assists on Cleaved enemy champions or kills on any unit grant 60 movement speed for 2 seconds instead. This Movement Speed is halved for ranged champions.
Endgame Items.name: The Black Cleaver
Endgame Items.plaintext: Dealing physical damage to enemy champions reduces their Armor
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +300 Health +55 Attack Damage +20% Cooldown Reduction UNIQUE Passive: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion Cleaves them, reducing their Armor by 5% for 6 seconds (stacks up to 6 times, up to 30%). UNIQUE Passive - Rage: Dealing physical damage grants 20 movement speed for 2 seconds. Assists on Cleaved enemy champions or kills on any unit grant 60 movement speed for 2 seconds instead. This Movement Speed is halved for ranged champions.

Endgame Items.description:
+450 Health
+60 Armor
-10% Damage taken from Critical Strikes

UNIQUE Passive - Cold Steel: When hit by basic attacks, reduces the attacker's Attack Speed by 15%.
UNIQUE Active: Slows the Movement Speed of nearby enemy units by 35% for 4 seconds (60 second cooldown).
Endgame Items.name: Randuin's Omen
Endgame Items.plaintext: Greatly increases defenses, activate to slow nearby enemies
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +450 Health +60 Armor -10% Damage taken from Critical Strikes UNIQUE Passive - Cold Steel: When hit by basic attacks, reduces the attacker's Attack Speed by 15%. UNIQUE Active: Slows the Movement Speed of nearby enemy units by 35% for 4 seconds (60 second cooldown).

Endgame Items.description:
+650 Health
+40 Attack Damage

UNIQUE Passive - Icy: Basic attacks slow the target's Movement Speed for 1.5 seconds on hit (40% slow for melee attacks, 30% slow for ranged attacks).
Endgame Items.name: Frozen Mallet
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +650 Health +40 Attack Damage UNIQUE Passive - Icy: Basic attacks slow the target's Movement Speed for 1.5 seconds on hit (40% slow for melee attacks, 30% slow for ranged attacks).

Endgame Items.description:
+600 Health
+50 Armor

UNIQUE Passive - Dreadnought: While moving, build stacks of Momentum, increasing movement speed by up to 60 at 100 stacks. Momentum quickly decays while under the effects of a stun, taunt, fear, silence, blind, polymorph, or immobilize effect, and slowly decays while slowed.
UNIQUE Passive - Crushing Blow: Basic attacks discharge all Momentum, dealing 1 physical damage per 2 stacks. If 100 stacks are discharged, damage is doubled and the target is slowed by 75% decaying over 1 second (melee only).

''There's only one way you'll get this armor from me...'' - forgotten namesake
Endgame Items.name: Dead Man's Plate
Endgame Items.plaintext: Build momentum as you move around then smash into enemies.
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +600 Health +50 Armor UNIQUE Passive - Dreadnought: While moving, build stacks of Momentum, increasing movement speed by up to 60 at 100 stacks. Momentum quickly decays while under the effects of a stun, taunt, fear, silence, blind, polymorph, or immobilize effect, and slowly decays while slowed. UNIQUE Passive - Crushing Blow: Basic attacks discharge all Momentum, dealing 1 physical damage per 2 stacks. If 100 stacks are discharged, damage is doubled and the target is slowed by 75% decaying over 1 second (melee only). ''There's only one way you'll get this armor from me...'' - forgotten namesake

+500 Health
+70 Magic Resist
+150% Base Health Regen
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive: Increases all healing received by 20%.
Endgame Items.name: Spirit Visage

+500 Health
+45 Armor

UNIQUE Passive - Immolate: Deals 25 (+1 per champion level) magic damage per second to nearby enemies.
Endgame Items.name: Sunfire Cape
Endgame Items.plaintext: Constantly deals damage to nearby enemies
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +500 Health +45 Armor UNIQUE Passive - Immolate: Deals 25 (+1 per champion level) magic damage per second to nearby enemies.

Endgame Items.description:
+55 Attack Damage
+50 Magic Resist
+10 Armor Penetration

UNIQUE Passive - Lifeline: Upon taking magic damage that would reduce Health below 30%, grants a shield that absorbs magic damage equal to 300 + 1 per bonus Magic Resistance for 5 seconds (90 second cooldown).
UNIQUE Passive - Lifegrip: When Lifeline triggers, gain +25% Attack Speed, +10% Spell Vamp, and +10% Life Steal until out of combat.
Endgame Items.name: Maw of Malmortius
Endgame Items.plaintext: Grants bonus Attack Damage when Health is low
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +55 Attack Damage +50 Magic Resist +10 Armor Penetration UNIQUE Passive - Lifeline: Upon taking magic damage that would reduce Health below 30%, grants a shield that absorbs magic damage equal to 300 + 1 per bonus Magic Resistance for 5 seconds (90 second cooldown). UNIQUE Passive - Lifegrip: When Lifeline triggers, gain +25% Attack Speed, +10% Spell Vamp, and +10% Life Steal until out of combat.

Starting Items.description:
Limited to 1 Trinket.

Active: Consume a charge to place an invisible Stealth Ward which reveals the surrounding area for 60 - 120 seconds.

Stores one charge every 180 - 120 seconds, up to 2 maximum charges.

Ward duration and recharge time gradually improve with level.

(Limit 3 Stealth Wards on the map per player. Switching to a Lens type trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds.)
Starting Items.name: Warding Totem (Trinket)
Starting Items.sanitizedDescription: Limited to 1 Trinket. Active: Consume a charge to place an invisible Stealth Ward which reveals the surrounding area for 60 - 120 seconds. Stores one charge every 180 - 120 seconds, up to 2 maximum charges. Ward duration and recharge time gradually improve with level. (Limit 3 Stealth Wards on the map per player. Switching to a Lens type trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds.)

Starting Items.description:
Limited to 5 at one time. Limited to 1 type of Healing Potion.

Click to Consume: Restores 150 Health over 15 seconds.
Starting Items.name: Health Potion
Starting Items.plaintext: Consume to restore Health over time
Starting Items.sanitizedDescription: Limited to 5 at one time. Limited to 1 type of Healing Potion. Click to Consume: Restores 150 Health over 15 seconds.

Starting Items.description:
Limited to 1 type of Healing Potion.

UNIQUE Active: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health over 12 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.
Starting Items.name: Refillable Potion
Starting Items.plaintext: Restores Health over time. Refills at shop.
Starting Items.sanitizedDescription: Limited to 1 type of Healing Potion. UNIQUE Active: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health over 12 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.
